title: Dobromyśl, Chełm County
text:
Dobromyśl is a <a href="village">village</a> in the administrative district of <a href="Gmina%20Siedliszcze">Gmina Siedliszcze</a>, within <a href="Che%C5%82m%20County">Chełm County</a>, <a href="Lublin%20Voivodeship">Lublin Voivodeship</a>, in eastern Poland. It lies approximately north-east of <a href="Siedliszcze%2C%20Gmina%20Siedliszcze">Siedliszcze</a>, west of <a href="Che%C5%82m">Chełm</a>, and east of the regional capital <a href="Lublin">Lublin</a>.
The village has a population of 83.
